article_title: Ben Carson could win key votes by drawing blacks to GOP primaries
article_text:

article_metadata.description: WEST MEMPHIS, Ark. — Sam Hawkins Jr. said he came to a recent rally here for the Republican presidential candidate Ben Carson because he finds Carson’s social conservatism appealing, relishes his newness to politics and believes that President Barack Obama “sold out for the vote” in supporting same-sex marriage. In other words, Hawkins resembles many of Carson’s supporters.
